name: Tiny House (itch)
description:
You live in a tiny house. That means that if you needs to use something, you must move everything around. As a lazy person, you decided to move everything only once a day.
Push and pull obstacles to make yellow-tinted objects available in your reach.

How to Play :
Arrow keys to move
Space to Push or Pull objects.

Installation :
Extract the zip and start DualityLauncher.exe

Graphics by : https://ldjam.com/users/nyan/
